pages.name: Ender Toxin I
pages.text: Infuses the projectiles of a turret with slimy water in order to be able to damage ender-based creatures like Endermen. It also prevents Endermen and Shulkers from teleporting away if damaged by one of these infused projectiles.

pages.name: Ender Toxin II
pages.text: In addition to the slime-water-infusion, the projectiles are coated with TNT in order to be able to damage huge ender-based creatures like the Ender Dragon.$(br2)$(5)$(o)Requires Ender Toxin I to be installed.$()
